name: Jack-o'-lympics
description:
You are a ghost in a pumpkin competing "ninja warrior" show style.

Ride your unicycle trough different stages. All narrated by a quirky vampire commentator.

Play with arrow keys to tilt and space to jump! (Game takes a moment to load, be patient :) )

This is made for the Spelkollektivet Halloween Game Jam 2022 in 2 days.
By:
Leene Künnap - Art

Brian Diamond - Programming, sound, voice acting
